mapper.update: UPDATE order_project SET storeid=#{storeId}, billno=#{billno}, orderpsnid=#{orderPsnId}, serviceprojectid=#{serviceProjectId}, ordertime=#{orderTime}, carinfoid=#{carInfoId}, customerid=#{customerId}, source=#{source}, status=#{status}, meno=#{meno}, creator=#{creator}, createtime=#{createTime}, modifier=#{modifier}, modifiedtime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.storeid, t.billno, t.orderpsnid, t.serviceprojectid, c.name service_name, t.ordertime, t.carinfoid, b.platnumber car_no, t.customerid, a.name customer_name, t.source, t.status, t.meno, t.creator, t.createtime, t.modifier, t.modifiedtime FROM order_project t left join customer a on t.customerid=a.id left join car_info b on t.carinfoid=b.id left join service_product c on t.serviceprojectid=c.id FROM order_project t where t.id=#{id}
